name: CthuCthu's Bizarre Adventure
description:
Game Background

CthuCthu's Bizarre Adventure is a third-person octopus runner game. CthuCthu is one of the most powerful ancient gods in the world. It lost its strength and was caught by scientists in the laboratory for experiments. One day it broke the container and escaped from the laboratory. Escape from it... Players can stick to the wall by stretching out CthuCthu's eight tentacles to move, avoiding the laboratory's lasers during the movement. In the end, It found its original power and became the root of the universe.

Control

1. Q/W/E/A/D/Z/X/C to extend the legs. If the leg reaches to objects, the player will be dragged in the direction of the leg.

2. Mouse can adjust camera angle. However, the player facing will not change.

3. Press T to back to save point (where you collected the octopus power)
